website_summaries.verdict: A basic audio monitor that comes at a good price and performs as expected.
pros: Monitor includes a nightlight for baby
LED lights on the parent receiver help alert sound
Easy to set up and use
Does a good job without static
cons: These can run on batteries, but they aren't rechargeable

customer_reviews.title: Once I came to trust it to transmit any talking/crying then I really began to like not hearing the snores and sighs coming from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a set that would frequently have interference and have to be positioned just so to make it through 1 plaster wall. This set has no trouble at all. It took awhile to get used to the feature where it doesn't continue to transmit sound if there is just white noise. I guess I was a bit paranoid that I might miss something quiet that was happening. Once I came to trust it to transmit any talking/crying then I really began to like not hearing the snores and sighs coming from the baby's room.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Plank

customer_reviews.title: Good but not Great- unit too light- battery not rechargable.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. The only complaint with this unit is that the monitor (he parents unit) is too light- meaning that even the weight of its cable can make it fall (and it has on a few occasions- to its merit- without damage). The other negative is that the battery is not rechargeable and lasts very little. Otherwise it works very well if used on a fixed or plugged in location.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: This things works great. I still have signal through 3 closed doors
customer_reviews.text: This things works great. I still have signal through 3 closed doors, down the hall, past my garage and outside in the driveway. And it filters out background noise in the room, but pops back on at the slightest sound from baby. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: You hear EVERYTHING.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this monitor because it works with 220v and we are traveling internationally soon. However, this monitor is just too sensitive and picks up the slightest sounds. We have a white noise machine in the baby’s room, and that noise transmitted all night long. I thought the eco mode was supposed to only transmit when sounds in the room changed, but that is not the case. Need to return and buy a vtech one that has sensitivity control... even though those are only 110v rated.
customer_reviews.author: mommaof2

customer_reviews.title: It's listening, even if you think it's turned off
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews on here that said the receiver quit working when it was only 20-30 feet away, however that's not the case...the receiver apparently shuts off all lights if it doesn't detect sound after several seconds, but it is not "off", it will wake back up when sounds are detected on the other end. I have tested this extensively within my house with my wife, and even took the device outside in our backyard and it was still working out there. Well worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised, NO TALK BACK FUNCTION.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived today. I ordered it to monitor my mother with alzheimer's. We bought it to replace another brand monitor that had reception issues. Consumer Reports says this brand has far superior reception. The problem is that the Amazon page comparing the Phillips brand monitors has a check box in the talk back functionality for this model. On arrival it is clear that it does not have that function. Amazon was very helpful in giving me a refund to apply to a model that appears to have the function but a correction to the comparison page will have to go through channels so be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 rounded up to a 3
customer_reviews.text: The price reflects the quality. It’s a no frills monitor. It has a good range and sound quality is decent. The main piece that stays with the baby can only be plugged in so doesn’t hold batteries. The portable piece that you take with you doesn’t have a strap so you have to eithe have pockets or hold it in your hands. We drilled holes to be able to fit a lanyard strap. Also the battery life is horrible. You WILL forget to turn it off so your batteries will drain very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JTC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to complaiment the Nest we use for video. I wanted something with sound only in case the best app crashed on my iPad in the middle of the night. This is fantastic and for the price, you can’t go wrong. The sound is great, turns up loud and is very light. We also took it to a friends and used it for my baby’s nap - again, fantastic. It doesn’t have 2-way speaking but we didn’t need/want that. It makes a sound and the light goes red on the parent monitor if it is not connected (if the one in baby’s room isn’t plugged in, for example) which is great if you forget to plug it in!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Kept shutting off
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this and was testing it. Put the baby monitor in 1 room with the TV on, and had the parent one in the kitchen. After a few minutes the unit just stopped. The light was still on, but no sound was coming out. If I hit the volume down or up it did come back on but then shut off again. I tried with batteries and plugged in, same result. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: so that was good. What I didn't like was the "eco" mode
customer_reviews.text: The monitor sound was very clear, so that was good. What I didn't like was the "eco" mode. When a constant noise (such as a noise machine) is on in the nursery, the monitor goes into the eco mode and you don't hear anything. Also, if the toddler is singing or making noise, if it's a constant noise, the monitor goes into eco mode again. I would have kept the monitor if there was a way of shutting off the eco mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But the range is a sad 30 feet
customer_reviews.text: The sound picks up clearly when baby makes a noise. But the range is a sad 30 feet? indoors, from baby's room down the wide hall, just to the kitchen area. I can't use it for any range or even to our master bedroom, even if that would be 2 doors and a corner wall. I returned it. If your house is small or you need it for simple areas, it's Great. For any distance walking around a 2600+ sq. ft. home, it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very simple but works well
customer_reviews.text: Does not have many features, but it works extremely well. I have another model from another brand with a ton of features, but it randomly changes the audio gain or something, waking me up over and over all night. This Philips monitor is consistent with a good signal, doesn't spaz out, and if the background noise is low enough it will actually cancel it out for you and stay totally silent. The remote unit does not have a rechargeable battery, and instead takes AAs. However, two AA batteries have lasted months in it with us unplugging it once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement to our wifi video monitor
customer_reviews.text: We needed an audio monitor to supplement a wifi video monitor that would disconnect when it was in audio mode. This was exactly what we needed, has worked great for us, and love the fact that it doesn’t pick up every noise as we have a sound machine in the babies room. It will only pick up the noise of the baby crying, which is all we need to hear, as my sons little sleeping noises would keep me up. Range has not been an issue for us, as we’ve used it outside as well as multiple floors below the room. Battery life has been exceptional as well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Reliable High quality audio monitor!
customer_reviews.text: We use this excellent audio wireless monitor as a security device, allowing us to monitor at night a 50 foot radius area near our home back doors and garage door. We can literally hear footfalls on the gravel near the doors! Sound quality is excellent and the volume controls simple to use. We have not tested the battery charge time as we rarely unplug it from it's 120v power adapter. The ambient sound cancelling/silencing feature seems very reliable. We awaken each morning to the sound of Doves "Coo-cooing" each morning (unfortunately well before sunrise!). Would definitely buy again & highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TucAnasazis

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound sensitivity adjustment
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE The power cord to the parent unit literally broke in two pieces. Not even sure how that’s possible. ORIGINAL REVIEW Effectively worthless. Has five levels of volume adjustment but the sensitivity still sucks. I can’t get it low enough. I want to hear the baby cry but don’t want to hear every snort or whimper. Babies are loud ass sleepers. I only need to wake up for the big stuff. With this it’s either so quiet I don’t hear anything or so loud I hear everything.
customer_reviews.author: tigerfive

customer_reviews.title: Eh....so so
customer_reviews.text: I would like these to be a bit louder. Also, if you turn off the adult area one, the one in the child's room will keep intermittently dinging until you go to that room and shut it off. I resent having to do that. If there's anything better out there for the money, I'll be replacing these soon.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Simmons

customer_reviews.title: A battery nightmare. Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: This was returned immediately upon opening it. Please be warned, if using the parent unit wirelessly, you'll need to use double a batteries and they CANNOT be charged while in the device. Unless you want to constantly be switching out batteries, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: K & A

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfying product
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using this monitor for 9 months now. Lets start from batteries. No way of using them, because you have to buy new ones 2 a months at least. I bought Duracell rechargeable batteries with a charger. A lifesaver, just need yo charge them overnight ones a month. Other then that high quality product. You can even hear the conditioner turning on and off) thanks Philips Avent
customer_reviews.author: Gohar

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in.. tested it for sound, seemed to work. The next day I tried to use it and found it quit working while in use. I only found this out bc I went to check on my baby while he was napping and he was screaming his head off yet no sound was coming through the monitor. I thought it was a fluke so I unplugged and plugged it back in. Still no sound. Moved to a different area of the house.. no sound. Disappointed so I returned the item :/
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Minimal features but does it's job well
customer_reviews.text: Reliable sound pickup, even on lowest sensitivity. Signal is clear on the opposite end of the house. Only one-way but if Small Fry wakes up, a disembodied voice won't get him back to sleep anyway. Video monitors are overrated. You can tell what kind of grievance they have by the sound. Only irritation is that it chirps mercilessly when the battery runs low or a side gets unplugged. Would like a silence button if you need to unplug it on purpose.
customer_reviews.author: DrMario86

customer_reviews.title: A very good Baby Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, I've recieved it about a week ago and it is perfect. setting it up took literally 2 minutes. the battery life on the parent unit is great (I use rechargeable batteries from Amazon), the parent unit has an AC adapter in case you want to use it without a battery but you will lose the flexibality of taking it anywhere you want around the house. I live in an appartment, the coverage is great. The really good thing is that you don't hear anything from the parent unit unless the baby unit pick up a sound. it is working perfectly on 220v.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim Almoujahed

customer_reviews.title: Free voltage, battery and outlet, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for! I shipped it to Korea and need free voltage baby monitor. This was the only one which has 100-240V in Amazon. I can only use simple adaptor and it works great!! You can use both battery and outlet for parent unit. The design is very simple and cute, and size is small enough to put it in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Rose A.

customer_reviews.title: the device is so lightweight that it does not stand up easily. Most important
customer_reviews.text: We bought this model because we previously owned an Avent monitor which worked well for 5 years. However, this one is inferior and defective. The monitor has to be plugged in to work as opposed to the other model which had batteries. Also, the device is so lightweight that it does not stand up easily. Most important, the receiver keeps on cutting in and out at random times. I'm returning it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Fresco

customer_reviews.title: Pay alittle more, get peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: The range on this is great. We couldn't believe it still worked while we were three floors up on the terrace but it did! Be sure to test it though. It's also nice that it filters out static noise so you don't have a constant noise coming out of the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Really great distance and clarity
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works well, even while outside it at the other end of the house. The different volume options are wonderful, so that you can de die if you want to hear every peep and movement or cries only. Appropriate notification of low battery, or when the two components aren’t synced (if the main unit is powered off for example). Really easy to use and great sound quality. Couldn’t ask for a better baby monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Theskittler

customer_reviews.title: The sound on this monitor is great, it never picks up the white noise sound ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this monitor is great, it never picks up the white noise sound machine or other random noises. It only kicks on when our child is calling for us. Signal is strong enough for our needs, the monitor is downstairs and speaker upstairs. As others have mentioned, the parent speaker unit is very light, which is annoying at times as it tips over and moves around the night stand, but does not impact the function.
customer_reviews.author: tst

customer_reviews.title: Well it was great... for like a month. Now it’s not.
customer_reviews.text: Well it was working great... but now that the return window closed, it stopped working properly! We have only had it for a couple months. And I’m scared because it can’t just be turning off in the middle of the night if my baby is in another room crying. I’m not happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time looking for a monitor that worked for us. I did not want any fancy video functionality, but just wanted clear sound, the monitor not to lose connection with the parent unit, and one that didn't kill batteries. This model didn't disappoint. I only wish it had the option of a 2nd parent unit. That would be my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: AAT

customer_reviews.title: Godsend
customer_reviews.text: This was a godsend for my husband and myself. His mother lives next door and close enough that this monitor would work with our bedrooms. We could hear anytime she got up in the middle of the night or needed us. Peace of Mind! Easy to set up....Just make sure they are both powered back on after a power outage. So we used this not as a baby monitor but as an adult monitor.
customer_reviews.author: MAC143142

customer_reviews.title: Simple and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and functional. I love that there is a light bar to show the noise level so that you can keep the volume low or you can see the noise if you are in a loud place. Only flaw in this simple system for me is that the battery saving feature doesn't work if you are playing white noise in the baby's room. I have never had any issues with losing connection or anything. Great monitor
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: No Bells and Whistles, Just Clear Sound without Interference
customer_reviews.text: A fundamental monitor that works well. We now have two monitors functioning in the house - one for my 92 year old mother and one for my significantly disabled wife. Different brands, different radio frequencies. The Phillips Avent monitor does not conflict with our older VTech monitor and provides clear, concise sound. Serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: RAF

customer_reviews.title: No recharageable battery in the Parent unit.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. I did not want to change the batteries every 2-3 days. It is a non-starter. Rechargeable battery in the parent unit is the way to go. It would be nice if I had the option for both in case I lost power.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Grotticelli

customer_reviews.title: Love these monitors
customer_reviews.text: Love these monitors. Easy to hear baby when she needs us throughout the night. We utilize rechargeable batteries for when we need to carry the unit around. I especially love that there are lights to indicate when baby is crying -- we were recently using it at a family reunion and it was way too loud to hear the monitor over all the guests. The light was so helpful for telling us when our baby was awake.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdybooklover

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on this product and based on those I decided to buy it. The first time I tried to use it, at 50 feet the sound cut out. It was intermittent and sometimes no sound at all. Tried unplugging, turning on and off, etc. As long as I was within 50 feet it worked. Not helpful at all since my room is 100 feet away. I called the company and they told me I had to email them my receipt and they would get back to me in 3-5 business days!! What am I supposed to do in the meantime?! I am returning the product. Very dissatisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: SSR

customer_reviews.title: Better than other leading brands.
customer_reviews.text: We are really happy with this baby monitor. We origally went with another brand but it would disconnect several times in the middle of the night. This one hasn’t disconnected once and is clear to hear our little one. Just know that if you put batteries in the back you shouldn’t plug it in. The directions warn about this.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie J. Fitte

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Overall works very well, and I would definitely recommend. I would give 4.5 stars if this was an option -- The only issue I have is that if a white noise machine is on too loud it doesn't block that sound, but in general I've been very happy with it for the price we paid. There are upgrade models for people who need more features. I've been able to adjust the white noise machine so that the monitor tunes it out.
customer_reviews.author: T. C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Working great for more than a month so far. Baby unit is upstairs and the parent unit works as far away as outside in the front or back yard. The visual indicator is great if you are doing something noisy. Only dislikes are that the green (on/connected) light is hard to see outside, but the parent unit beeps if it cannot detect the baby unit, so you know. Also they are easy to knock over.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: this is a no frills monitor for a good price. it solved the one issue i had with prior cheap monitors of the constant white noise which would prohibit me from falling asleep. the sound quality is very clear, good range and no white noise on the receiver end.
customer_reviews.author: christopher st peter

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I was bargain shopping, and got what I paid for. This doesn’t seem to pick up sound consistently. There are times it doesn’t pick up until my baby is clearly mid super-cry. I was looking for something inexpensive, but at least wanted it to do the minimum job required. Not impressed here.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Vandenberg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can travel pretty far throughout the house and it’s still connected. Sometimes it sounds like it off or not connected, but when there’s no sound, it sounds dead. Once there’s moment or slight noises, it picks up right away on it and then mutes again when it’s done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup, great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a trip away with our little one! Was strange getting used to not having video, as we have a video system at home - but this was perfect for the road trip! Great sound quality and love the lights on the front so you can have the volume down but it shows you when it detects sound. So easy to setup!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: No bells, no whistles. Just perfect function!
customer_reviews.text: The eco mode was confusing at first because it kept cutting out, but then I realized it’s supposed to do that and now I love it! Wish the batteries lasted longer on the receiver but that’s my fault for not remembering to turn it off. I love that it’s only a one way sound system too
customer_reviews.author: ashleymarie

customer_reviews.title: Not as good
customer_reviews.text: My last baby monitor was a white model by the same company, and it was amazing! Unfortunately my little one pulled it off the table and broke it So I replaced it with this model because I couldn't find the one I loved so much. This one is terrible compared to my last. I literally walk into another room and it cuts in and out. With my last I could walk to my car real quick, and not lose signal. Awful product. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Raegen Green

customer_reviews.title: Does the job without making you crazy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, I just keep them plugged in I don’t mind. Let me tell you what, the best feature of this product is the masking of background noises. It it pretty good we have a sound machine on almost full blast, you might get some static now and then, but I suspect it may be when it can hear a little movement like rolling over since I’ve got a sleep thrasher lol otherwise, way better than the v-tech ones. Those are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: If you want a simple audio monitor for your baby, this is for you. It does chew through AA batteries but that's expected with something battery operated. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: ciaobella10

customer_reviews.title: Audio signal you can trust.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very signal-intensive area and needed a reliable baby monitor with little or no interference. Gladly, this Philips model delivers just that. Range is pretty good too: I have to use both units with several walls and plumbing between them, and the reception on the parent unit is crisp and steady. The only down side is the battery life, which could be better, but there's also the option of plugging both units to the socket.
customer_reviews.author: Augusto

customer_reviews.title: Loud, durable, long range
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased the vtech DM221 baby monitor, which turned out to be too quiet, since I am hard of hearing. This, however is super loud, has good range, and can be plugged in or use battery power. I even accidentally dropped the receiver in the dog water bowl, dried it out, and it worked like new. Great buy, and is a great combination with a baby camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Zaccagnini

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great baby monitor. Nothing fancy but has great range and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O.

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why people waste money on expensive monitors
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people waste money on expensive monitors. We've had this for a year and there are no complaints. It even zones out white noise after a while, but you will absolutely hear even if the baby shifts or changes sleep positions. I also love the simple design. Great monitor very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: AAbbasi

customer_reviews.title: Best Monitor Ever by Far!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best baby monitor I’ve ever owned. It silences ambient noise such as a fan or music but turns on the second baby makes a peep. It’s so quiet you don’t even realize it’s on! It’s also so sensitive it can pick up a cell phone on vibrate in babies room.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Vogler

customer_reviews.title: Baby monitor is not working
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the product as i had the worst item from amazon for the first time The story started once I received the product in egypt and i bought 2 types of rechargeable batteries and though the baby monitor was not working without being added to the electricity plug And then I visited Avent official store in egypt and they admitted that the baby monitor ( Internal charging circuit ) Please advice what shall i do now !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: We have a video baby monitor and a cheap safety first monitor.. this one beats them all! No static what so ever, and the fact that i don't have to listen to her sound machine all night really changes the game. Save your dollars and go with this one. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna

customer_reviews.title: An excellent baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say but this baby monitor works great. There are so many options and I'm glad we ended up getting this one. I love how the main unit can be plugged in or can be battery powered. The range is very good. We've never had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Bought because I didn't want a creepy camera in the nursery that could be hacked. If you disconnect the walk around one, the batteries don't last more than a day. Bought a second one for my parents home.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little monitor. We have had it in our daughter's room at night and been out at the fire pit about 175 feet away and it worked just fine for 3 hours on battery.

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this monitor! I researched lots of different monitors and read hundreds of reviews before making my purchase, and i'm glad I went with this one. I have no trouble with it ever losing signal anywhere inside my home, and I can even work in the yard or garage without a problem. The sound quality is amazing and the battery life works just fine for our needs. The first time I used it, I was scared that maybe the monitor wouldn't pick up my daughter's noises until she was screaming, but that's not the case at all! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch baby monitor highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent baby monitor signal gets through everything with no issues sound is very clear and very sensitive and the microphone makes the baby voice very clear regardless of what they do thank you very much for such a great value product
customer_reviews.author: D. Qubo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect basic monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Great. So easy to use, just the push of a button. Comes with power cord for parent unit but no rechargeable batteries. I just threw some AA's in and it works great for when I have to be in the kitchen away from the baby. The power cord will come in handy when the baby is sleeping in his room.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Hear your baby from afar.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, no static at all. You don't need a fancy video monitor. Kid crying is all you really need to know. I wish this were a bit heavier as the cord is heavier than the monitor. Other than that the lack of rechargable battery is disappointing but it works as advertised. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Big_Chungus

customer_reviews.title: Convenient baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use, just plug it in and listen. My only complaint is that the receiver falls over frequently because the base is too narrow. Other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ehrlich

customer_reviews.title: Best audio monitor for the money
customer_reviews.text: The best audio monitor. Much better than anything at anywhere near the price. We have tried several other cheaper audio monitors, and none even come close to the audio quality (especially the noise gate) and range and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Y Alpert

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: We have not had any of the issues that others complain of. The reach of the unit is awesome, battery life adequate, sensitivity to sound in the baby's room is just right, and I love that the unit chimes to let me know when it has lost connection with the base. If I were to have any complaint, it would be the lack of a clip on back of receiver to attach to belt or waistband.
customer_reviews.author: EABF

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding basic monitor
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for a disabled person. It was wonderful to not hear static. The monitors are 50' apart and through 2 sheer walls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super simple but does the job very well
customer_reviews.text: Super simple but does the job very well. We have had no issues with connection through our home. I really like how it is quiet when my baby is quiet. I also like that I can mute it and just see the sound with the lights - great for when I am trying to kick back.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a family vacation
customer_reviews.text: I needed a monitor to take out of the country and this one worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissa

customer_reviews.title: I had purchased for my screened back porch. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased for my screened back porch. The speech on the indoor receiver was inaudible due to the static. Donated them to charity.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly and without static. We live in a house built in 1895 with plaster walls so I was a little worried about reception. We take this all over the house and outside. Love that it has a battery but only uses it when it's not plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Badger2002

customer_reviews.title: Basic Monitor, works very well, recommended
customer_reviews.text: have two of these monitors and have ordered a third, works well and does the job as a baby monitor. Pros: easy to setup and operate, very clear sound quality, large range, has AC adapter, can be operated cordless, relatively inexpensive as I purchased on Amazon Warehouse,. Cons: not expandable to two or more receiver sets, very basic set of features.
customer_reviews.author: ntf

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great baby monitor for the price. It turns on after holding for 3 seconds. Our electricity went out and the parent end beeped and turned red so I knew it wasn’t monitoring. I would have never known
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!

product_meta.title: Philips AVENT DECT Baby Monitor, White
product_meta.description: Enjoy peace of mind with the Philips AVENT SCD501/10 DECT Baby Monitor. DECT technology guarantees zero interference from any other transmitting product like other baby monitors, cordless phones and cell phones. It also provides high quality, crystal clear sound so you can hear your baby anytime. The five sound-activated LED lights alert you of the noise level in your baby's room even when the parent unit is muted. If your baby is restless when you put them to bed, you can help soothe and calm your baby to sleep with the warm tranquil glow of the night light. With a range of 300m you can be fully mobile in and around the home. The parent unit can be outlet or battery powered using AA batteries (not included).
feature_bullets: DECT technology guarantees zero interference, clear souund, with range up to 900 feet
Parent unit is outlet or battery powered
5 sound activated LED lights to show sound level and comfort nightlight
Parent unit is outlet or battery powered, AA batteries not included
Smart ECO mode for efficient use of energy
